scripts.build0comment: browserserver.js + node_emulator_for_worker.js = browserserver_with_node_emulator_for_worker.js (dynamic worker creation at runtime needs a string of code)
scripts.build1js: cd client/js && concat-files declare.js external_dependencies/zip/zip_zip-ext.js ui.js uiFiles.js rtc.js bytes.js localData.js sockets.js built/browserserver_with_node_emulator_for_worker.js serviceWorkerManager.js launcher.js -o built/concat.js && cd ../..
scripts.build2js: cd client/js && browserify built/concat.js -o built/browserified.js && concat-files external_dependencies/zip/zip_zip-ext.js built/browserified.js -o built/all.js && cd ../..
scripts.minifytest: uglifyjs temp/uglifyjstest/u.js --mangle --compress --preamble "//See u.js/ to see the source;" --screw-ie8 --output temp/uglifyjstest/u.min.js
scripts.minifyjs3: uglifyjs client/js/built/all.js --mangle --compress --preamble "//See client/ to see the source;" --screw-ie8 --output client/js/built/all.min.js
scripts.minifyjs3verbose: uglifyjs client/js/built/all.js --mangle --compress --preamble "//See client/ to see the source;" --screw-ie8 --verbose --lint --output client/js/built/all.min.js
scripts.buildjs: npm run build0jsinsertnodeemulator && npm run build1js && npm run build2js && npm run minifyjs3 && npm run bumpversion && npm run versioninserviceworker4 && npm run minifyserviceworkerjs5
scripts.buildcss1: cd client/css && concat-files base.css header.css userlist.css fileinput.css yesNoDialog.css -o built/all.css && cd ../..
scripts.buildcss3: cd client/css && concat-files base.css header.css pre.css -o built/documentation.css && cd ../..
scripts.buildcss: npm run buildcss1 && npm run minifycss2 && npm run buildcss3 && npm run minifycss4
scripts.buildall: npm run buildjs && npm run buildcss && npm run buildhtml && npm run builddoc
